languages.text: "Вот только настоящей драки пока никакой и не было. Доколе мы будем блуждать кругами, избегая битвы?"

traits.locale_text: "Вот только настоящей драки пока никакой и не было. Доколе мы будем блуждать кругами, избегая битвы?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
languages.original_text: "Вот только настоящей драки пока никакой и не было. Доколе мы будем блуждать кругами, избегая битвы?"

traits.locale_text: "The thing is there's yet to be any real fight. How long will we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The thing is there's yet to be any real fight. How long will we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The thing is there's yet to be any real fight. How long are we going to wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The thing is there's yet to be any real fight. How long are we going to wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Todavía no he tenido una pelea decente. ¿Cuánto tiempo vamos a pasar dando vueltas rehuyendo el combate?».
languages.original_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"

traits.locale_text: «El caso es que todavía no ha habido ningún combate en firme. ¿Cuánto tiempo vamos a estar dando vueltas en círculos evitando la lucha?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “真正的战斗依然没有开始，我们到底还要兜圈子兜多久？”
languages.original_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"

traits.locale_text: “但这里并没有真正的战斗，我们还要这么兜圈子兜多久？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « L'ennui, c'est que nous n'avons toujours pas eu l'occasion de combattre. Combien de temps allons-nous encore tourner en rond ? »
languages.original_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"

traits.locale_text: « L'ennui, c'est que nous n'avons toujours pas eu l'occasion de combattre. Combien de temps allons-nous encore tourner en rond ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺はまだ真の戦いを目にしていない。いつまで堂々巡りをして、戦いを避け続けなければならないんだ？」
languages.original_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺はまだ真の戦いを目にしていない。いつまで堂々巡りをして、戦いを避け続けなければならないんだ？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe noch keinen echten Kampf erlebt. Wie lange müssen wir uns noch im Kreis drehen und der Schlacht ausweichen?"
languages.original_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Sache ist nur ... es gab noch gar keinen richtigen Kampf. Wie lange wollen wir noch im Kreis wandern und eine Schlacht vermeiden?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Henüz gerçek bir dövüş görmedim. Çatışmadan kaçarak daha ne kadar dönüp dolaşmamız gerekiyor?"
languages.original_text: "I have yet to see a real fight. How much longer must we wander in circles, avoiding battle?"
